data.message:
Every single day, unknown number of people have been killed, kidnapped, or arrested in Syria! Most of them are innocents children, men and women. Nevertheless, no body or country truly stood against who did this!! Besides, no one protects who still suffer and vulnerable to these kind of terrorism a country wide one.
We as "Humans" should stand for and be united to solve the bigger issues in our beloved earth that will lead to shrink the little and make them disappear! #Stand_and_pray_for_Syria_and_all_countries <3
